index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Pike Place Place Urban Renewal Project; authorizing application for and execution of an agreement with the United States Economic Development Administration (EDA) and Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) for financial assistance in connection with the restoration of the Fairley Group of structures in the Pike Place Market Historical District; authorizing implementation of said project by the Department of Community Development; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
